plot outline: People generally relocate to Chennai with dreams of becoming a doctor, lawyer, minister, entrepreneur or actor, but Gurusami has other ideas altogether. Upon arrival, he serendipitously falls in love and while it looks as if his love will succeed, he is falsely accused of murder. Carrying the tremendous burden of having been labelled a criminal and a murderer Gurusami faces a lot of difficulty and suffering. Will he find it within himself to transcend this seemingly irreparable blotch on his character? Whether he manages to overcome the trials that befall him forms the crux of the story. This serious and sensitive subject has been dealt with a splash of humor in the movie.
